case.state: Oh? Are all these boys here to show off for me? Well, if you insist...
Oh, is this a poker game? Fun! You don't mind me joining in, do you?
Ooh, poker! I've played a little, but I've never been very good. Count me in!
I've always played poker for money, but I guess this works too. I just hope I don't lose like I usually do...
That's the name you're going by? Somebody has issues...

state.text: Uh, okay, it's a rare name, but benefit of the doubt, you didn't know - that's my brother's name. So I'm going to call you Mr H.
Come on, I know you're not the real Claude, you're just some wannabe. So, you know, that's what I'll call you.
Uh, no. This isn't happening. I'm the only Hilda around here. You can be... I don't know, Helga.
Uh, okay, it's a rare name, but benefit of the doubt, you didn't know - that's my brother's name. So I'm going to call you Ms H.

case.state: Ooh, very commanding. I think you and I are going to enjoy this, ~player~.
Oh, hey, we've got the whole academy represented, even Abyss. Well, I guess it's up to me to show you why the Deer get the Gold!
I feel like there's something I'm missing here, like... you two all look so much more mature and stuff...
A table full of pink-haired badasses and ~player~, huh? Not that I'm complaining, but it seems like someone has a type.
Really, Fina? You think there are people who wouldn't know that before arriving? Better safe than sorry, I guess...
So... a butterfly and a ball of light. This feels like it's probably going to be a weird game.
Well, this is nice seeing everyone... I was more expecting to be meeting new people, but this is fun too.
Huh... so you all... totally remember I'm definitely bad at poker and bluffing and all that stuff...
Is that you, Bernadetta? You look... different. I mean, not bad, just... I didn't think you would change so much so quickly, I guess?
Oh, Leonie, you look... different. Like, more adult. It's a good look on you.
I'm sorry, uh... are you sure you've got the right person? I think I would remember meeting someone who looked like you, Marth, and I just... don't.
Bernie? I didn't pick you to be a poker player, but it's always nice to see a friendly face!
Oh, Bernie! Are you here to work on your confidence? Good for you!
Uh, Bernie... I don't think this is a seminar. This is just a game of strip poker. But it should still help you with your confidence!
"Social interaction practice"? Uh... sure, that's... kind of what this is. If the professor said you should come here, then it'll probably be fine.
Oh! Hey Professor Nevrand! Am I supposed to call you that outside of the classroom? Should I be pretending I don't know you?
Here's the deal: you don't ask me if I've been practicing my archery, I won't lie to you about how much archery practice I've done.
Oh... this is weird. I'm not used to seeing teachers at poker games. Should I go?
Are you a mercenary or a teacher right now? Because if you're a teacher, I think we should both pretend I was never here.
Oh, I love your hair, Laevatein! Maybe we could share tips after the game?
Be prepared to lose, everybody - you made the mistake of playing against me on my birthday!
Um... not that I want to say anyone's cheating, but how is that ball of light going to strip?
Um... everyone else sees the talking butterfly, right? Okay, good.
Galatea, huh... I think that's Ingrid's family's name. But she has the crest of Daphnel. There was no great hero Galatea... so who are you supposed to be?
Ooh, is somebody looking for a date? Well you're in luck, Valentine is my middle name. No, I mean it seriously is!
So Amy, you're a pink-haired fighter who specializes in two-handed weapons, huh? If I didn't know better, I might start to think ~player~ has a type.
What do you know, another Golden Deer! I didn't expect to see you here, Leonie! I guess a competition like this would be just right for you, huh?
Did Claude send you here to spy on me, Leonie? Because if he did, you're not spying very well.
Oh! Ignatz! I didn't expect to see you here. You do know the stakes of this poker game, right?
Ignatz? I didn't pick you to be into this sort of game. But, hey, always nice to have a friend, right?
Oh, ~rivalHouse~! You know about this place too, huh? Well, good luck - when I represent the Deer, I play to win!
I was told there'd be a hot and steamy poker game, but I'm starting to think Alois might have been the one to arrange this...
Ugh, walking over sand is the worst! Does anyone have a wyvern I could ride?
I hate walking over sand. What's the point of going to the beach if you're not in a cute swimsuit?
I've heard this place has all sorts of crazy poker games all the time - so deal me in!
Wait, what? Like... no, you're not our Professor. Are you? What are you trying to pull here? This is just a coincidence, right?
Looks like we've got a proper house competition going on! Well, the Golden Deer don't back down from a challenge! Fear the deer!
Don't think that just because I'm outnumbered, I'm going to give up. Fear the deer!
~deerFriend~? I can't say I expected to see another Deer here, but I'm not complaining! How about we show these dastards why they should fear the Deer!
Pink hair all around? Wow! Look at us!
Look at us! Finally, some other people who get what a cute look pink hair is! Helps if it's your natural color, though...
Oh, wow, a table full of Golden Deer, huh? You know, if we were going to be doing this all together, we probably could have just played at the academy...
Oh, this is just weird. I mean, no offense or anything, ~churchPerson~, I'm sure you're hot when you're naked, but that's not how I think about teachers, you know?
All set up for a girls' night, huh? That's fine by me!
All these boys here just for me? You're not going to make me strip while all the rest of you watch, are you? I'd just hate that.
Hey there, "Oh Mighty Creator". Are you here to test some new batch of lines?
Oh hey, you're my artist, right? What're you here for? Didn't get enough of an eyeful when you were making me?
So... what're the rules for this game again?
I hope none of you mind playing against a newbie! I've only played a couple of times!
Go easy on me, okay?
I can just learn while we're playing, right?
I think this hand is good enough already.
I don't think this needs any changing...
Do I have to change cards, or- no? Great.
Nothing to change here!
Doesn't get better than this!
Oh, these cards are the winning hand, believe me. Fear the Deer!
No cards up my sleeve - you can already tell, I'm sure!
Hey, are you staring at my chest? No? Why not?
All set here! You know, aside from being without most of my clothes.
No cards for me! Feel free to let your eyes linger a while, though.
This one's throwing off my hand.
Almost right... I'll just change this one.
I'll just swap this one and hope to get lucky.
Uno! Oh, uh, wait. Wrong game. I still need one card, though!
Full do-over here! Is there a special word for that in poker?
...no, I don't think I can make anything out of this hand. I'll need a fully new set.
Could you swap out... um, everything, I guess?
I'll need just one little change. Thanks!
Just changing this card. You'll make sure it's a good replacement, right?
I'll just need one card. By the way, am I allowed to bribe the dealer by showing him my boobs? No? What if I do it anyway?
Oh, this hand is just completely... I'll need five new cards, please.

Talk about getting screwed, and not in the fun way! Not yet, at least.
Seriously though, new hand here.
Time for a gambit! Five new cards!
One, two... ~cards.text~ cards please!
Umm... maybe ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? I think that's right.
How many cards do you guys think I should- oh, I'm not supposed to show you my cards yet, right? Then I'll say ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
I think I need... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~?
Can you swap out these ~cards.text~? Thanks!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for me! Better not be getting distracted!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ over here!
Give me... let's say ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
All the same type and in order! That's pretty rare, right? Is that good?
Oh! They match! That's good, right?
Oh no, I'd just hate it if somebody was distracted by how much skin I'm showing...
I might not have much left to wear, but I'm not losing this round!
Whew, this should keep me safe for now.
Ha! None of you have a chance at taking me down this time!
You might as well all give up and strip a layer this round - I'm unbeatable.
You're up against my best now - don't expect me to go down easy.
Oh, I think this is supposed to be good, right?
I'm not going to show you, but... let's just say I'm feeling pretty confident this round.
Oh, right, bluffing! Um... "Oh no, this is such a bad hand..."
Are you sure we aren't putting money on this? I feel like we should be.
Wow, I'm a natural at this!
Is this beginner's luck, or is poker just super easy?
This is my round to win! Fear the deer!
I guess this will do.
This should protect me this round...
Does anyone have a guide to like, obscure secret winning hands? I just want to check these ones...
Which part of the card do I want to match again? The number? Or is it the little picture?
Can I just show somebody this hand and they can tell me if this is any good?
Why did they make all those rules for what hands are special and what ones aren't? I think all of them are good!
Can I count my boobs as a pair? No, that's fair, it was a long shot.
If I accidentally dropped my cards, could I get a new hand again? How about if I dropped them in a sexy way?
You're really gonna make me work for this, huh?
Well, I can at least try with this hand...
Guess I'll give this a shot.
So... is there a way we can gang up on someone in this game? It just seems like ~leader~ has a bit too much left.
Does anyone want to swap hands?
Maybe it's good we're not playing for money...
Can I just sit this round out?
Well, I can still hope this is only second-worst...
Which part of the card do I want to match again? The number? Or is it the little picture?
Can I just - oh, I'm not allowed to swap cards again? Damn.
Are you sure these are my cards? Not... you know, someone else's? Please?
Oh come on! I can't lose another hand now!
What?! No! I can't keep losing now!
Am I not showing off enough already?!
None of you have a chance at taking me down this time.
Maybe I should have just played it straight from the start? No, that's just ridiculous.
I can handle this. This is fine. Everything is fine.
Oh, and I think it's time I let you all know - I'm actually not new to poker. I was just trying to get an advantage. Sorry!
Now I'm down to my underwear, I guess I should confess - I actually know poker pretty well. The innocent act is just a trick Claude taught me.
Hey, so, minor confession - I might have been lying a little about how good I am at poker. Because I'm actually pretty good.
Oh, this is weird. My only cards with numbers on them are ten and one; the rest all have those people on them, and they've all got the same little picture... do I win now?
So, I haven't played poker much. My cards all have sequential numbers, and they've all got the same little picture... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got four of the same number... that's really good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got one matching number pair and one set of three... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. My cards all have the same picture in the corner... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. My cards all have numbers one after another... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got three matching numbers here... that's good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. I've got two matching number pairs here... that's pretty good, right?
So, I haven't played poker much. Two of my cards match... that's an okay hand, right?
So, I haven't played poker too much. None of my cards match... that's bad, right?
Bernie? Bernie! BERNIE!!! She must have fainted! I guess we... just keep playing until she wakes up?

You mean...?
You know what, yeah, I think I could see that. Assuming you'd be up for that too, Leonie.
Ignatz does all sorts of art for the Deer, but I never thought about getting him to do a nude painting of me... especially to give to someone else.
Is that a picture of... oh, she's naked there, huh?
You know, Bernie, I'd be happy to help you accessorize some time. The usual uniform is fancy enough on its own, but I think you need some sparkle for when you're out of uniform.
Honestly, offering a threesome with two hot women sounds like it should work just fine. I know it would work to get me into bed.
Hey, Bernie, you like plants and stuff, right? Do you have a favorite flower or something that someone could design a hair clip to look like?
Whaaat? Come on Leonie, you know me - I'm just a delicate flower! There's nothing I can teach you about fighting!
Well... maybe there's a little bit I can show you some time, but I don't know... I just don't have much free time for sparring with all the jobs I'm being given all the time...
So, Pyrrha, did Beacon not have any sort of sauna or baths or anything? I mean, the way you're acting, I'd almost think you've never been naked in front of anyone before.
I might not pay too much attention in history class, but even I know the War of Heroes was what shaped Fódlan as we know it.
I'm not great at history, but the War of Heroes and the Ten Elites created the nobility of Fódlan, including my ancestor Goneril, so... that, definitely.
I don't know about admire, but I'm descended from Goneril, one of the Ten Elites - I even bear his crest. That's a pretty good connection.
He's not really historical yet, but Holst will definitely get into the history books one day. He's the head of our noble house and an amazing general - does that count?
I don't know anything like that myself, but if you ever meet someone called Seteth, you should definitely ask him.
Oh come on, it won't be that bad! It's just a little kiss! It's a fun little tradition!
It's just a little tradition Professor Casagranda was telling everyone about. Didn't you see the one she hung over the door to her office?
Well, tomorrow is my day off, and thankfully I don't have any "bonus lectures" scheduled, so I'm going to sleep in and avoid chores. It's going to be great.
Ugh, classes, training, all that stuff. I'd rather not think about that, honestly, it'll just spoil the fun of the game.

Not at all - I have an older brother, Holst, and he totally smothers me. Part of why I enrolled in Garreg Mach in the first place was to get away from having him looking over my shoulder all the time...
Ugh, no - my brother Holst is this famous general. If I didn't have him though, I'd have to be in charge of House Goneril, so I guess it's not all bad.

That's... not something I've had people ask about directly before. It's a bit weird to say it out loud, but... I really love it when people show their care for me by doing work that I don't want to do.
No, Bernie, you weren't a bad girl at all. You followed all the rules, did exactly what you were told... you were such a good girl.
Oh, don't worry about that! Just work with what you've got! And for the record, I think small and cute is a good look.
Wait... does ~leader~ have as much of a lead as I think? How did that happen?
~leader~ has to be cheating, right? This is crazy!
Hey, Leonie, you remember how I said I'd seen you play poker before? I meant it. I know all your tells. I've already won this game. So, you know, good luck!
Well, I'll never turn down a compliment... but if you're looking for suggestions, I think my boobs are looking especially good today.
All compliments are good compliments, really, but if you're looking for inspiration... well, when I checked this morning, my ass was looking pretty great.
Very eager to please, aren't you? I might just have to take you up on that offer...
Well, I can't speak for anyone else, but the promise of good food and hot sex works pretty well on me. No reason it has to be complicated, you know?

I've never had too hard a time of it. Just find a guy who thinks you're hot - that shouldn't be any sort of challenge for you - and offer him food or just straight-up sex. Oh, it helps if you show off some cleavage too, but you've clearly got that figured out.
What? No, it's... it makes sense. It's a good strategy. It's psychological warfare.

condition.saying: Alright, I've been thinking, and I've settled on my mercenary title. Ready? ... The Blade Breaker II. What do you all think?

case.state: Blade Breaker II, huh? After the original Blade Breaker, Jeralt. It's... honestly not bad. I think it suits you. If anyone's earned it, I'd say it was you.

condition.saying: I want to be a top-tier mercenary, like Captain Jeralt the Blade Breaker. For my title, Caspar suggested... The Raging Bear. Well?

case.state: The Raging Bear... you know, I like it. Adds a good element of surprise that Claude will like too. I mean, who expects to be shot by an arrow from a bear?

condition.saying: If I want to be as good as the Blade Breaker, I need my own tough-sounding title. I was thinking... The Executioner. Well?

case.state: Executioner!? Talk about dark! I mean, I guess I can kind of see it, but don't you want to be more a defender of the innocent than a ransacker of towns?
So, Senko, I know I was lying about being a beginner at poker, but I want you to know that I honestly would love a pampering from you. It sounds like an amazing time, really.
Hey, Leonie, if I became a mercenary, what sort of name do you think would fit me? Maybe... The Steel Saint? The Heartstringer? Ooh, The Pink Dragon?
Mobile fortress destroyer? I don't know what that is, but I've fought off some pretty nasty demonic beasts. Some of those are big enough to eat people in a single bite!
Oh Bernie, you don't have to do that! Nobody here is planning to take advantage of you!
Wait, hold on. Marianne talks to Dorte all the time, and she never speaks back. Are you sure you know what a horse is?
Wait, Seteth's been working on a book with you too, Bernie? I've been helping him write a book of fairy tales!
Wow, Seteth writes a lot, huh? There's the fables he wrote for Flayn when she was younger, and now the book about the saints.
Stern but kind, huh? Sounds kind of like Seteth too. He even has the Crest of Cichol. I wonder what Professor Hanneman would think about that...
Oh, the White Heron Cup! That was so much fun! I was chosen as the dancer for the Golden Deer.
I don't know about talking, but there were those big ones that we had to fight down in Abyss... oh, but you weren't there for that, Bernie, so there's no way you'd have known about them.

Really, Leonie? I already know your answer to that question, and it's "being Jeralt."
I'm kidding, I'm kidding! Mostly.

It's worth it for getting to wear cute swimsuits and see other hot people in swimsuits too. The sand has a way of getting in uncomfortable spots though, and it's hard to walk over... there's good and bad, I guess.
Well, I mean, I've played a couple of times, but you know, just for fun, nothing serious. You know I could never play as well as someone like Claude.
Who, me? My poker face is terrible, Leonie, you should know that. This is all just good luck, that's all.
Oh? Would you prefer I was drooling over you instead, Leonie? Don't worry, I have plenty of attention to go around.
Nice to meet you, Asuna - you can call me Hilda. I don't think you need to be so formal here, though.
Oh, sure! Do you have an idea of what you want? I see you've already got a good brooch, so... maybe a hair clip or necklace?
Shocked that what? Is this some sort of future thing you know about? That dastard doesn't manage to actually kill the professor, does he!?

Being famous sounds like a whole lot of hard work. That's why I'm so glad Holst is older than I am - if not for that, I'd be supposed to run House Goneril and be on the Council for the Alliance, and... ugh, it would be awful.
I don't know... I guess any jokes with people dying in them seem less funny nowadays. Even if they're usually only bandits, I've had too much of that in reality.

Oh, you know, mostly just to brush up on my poker skills. I'm not very good, so this seemed like a good place to practice, since money isn't on the line. Plus, I'll hopefully get to see some hot people naked.
Well, you know, when you... hang out and stuff. Have fun together. I don't think it needs to be super formally defined or anything.
Who, me? I have no idea what you're talking about, Senko. I'm just trying to get comfortable.
Do you really think I'd do something so underhanded as try to distract people with my cleavage to try to get an advantage, Senko? Do I seem like a scheming mastermind to you?
Mostly just bandits, but... yes, I've killed before. It's something I try not to think about too much, so thanks for that, Revy.
Oh, sure - I've got plenty of experience with... hm. Well, I don't know about dating too well, that's more Dorothea's area of expertise, but I know plenty about sex, if that would help.

Hmm... well, Fódlan has Derdriu. I'm a bit biased with how long I've spent there, but I honestly love it - the shops are all amazing, there's all sorts of things getting imported and exported all the time, and the beaches are perfect.
I don't know if you care about history and religious stuff, but I know a ton of people come through Garreg Mach's cathedral on holidays. It's got stained glass and all that sort of pretty stuff.
Well, I've only personally seen Derdriu, but I've heard Fhirdiad and Enbarr are just as incredible. If you have the chance, I'd say that visiting all three capitals would be worthwhile.
You guys had better watch out, you know? Leonie really knows how to play poker, like really competitively. I've seen her, it was crazy.
It's so weird to have the smallest boobs in the room. Is this how other people feel around me?
Look at us! Talk about school spirit! Who knew there were going to be so many students here?
We might all be in uniform, but I've gotta say, this is way better than regular class.
Ugh, I'm going to have to re-tie that after the game. Winning had better be worth it...
So... does nobody want to see me touch myself, or...?
Come on, I am one loss away from having to forfeit. Do you guys think I'm not pretty or something?
You've got this, Bernadetta! Just imagine everyone in their underwear!
You're brave enough for this, Bernie! Just pretend this game of strip poker is archery! The cards are the arrows, and... um... okay, no, that doesn't work. But you can still do it!
You know, if anyone wants some makeup tips after we're done here, I'd be happy to offer my advice.
I know that makeup's not for everyone, but I'd be happy to help anyone after the game if they wanted.
I... don't know what this means.
Is this good?
I mostly want matching numbers, right?
You know, I think Claude would love this place. He'd probably be pretty much unbeatable, though - nobody can out-bluff the leader of the Golden Deer!
Not a lot of point in trying to cover myself up with these cards, is there? Alright, just go ahead and stare.
I'm not really feeling like losing this round, could one of you do that for me?
Ugh, I'm going to have to put some actual effort into not losing this, aren't I? Bleh.
Have you ever thought of making clothes for other people, Bernie? I know you make your own. We could make such cute outfits together!
Have you tried working on clothes with someone else, Bernie? I was just thinking how if we combined my accessories with your clothes, we could do great things!
Oh, then we've got to get you to Garreg Mach some day. The sauna's great, especially naked - and it's not like you'd be showing off any more than you already are, right?
Oh, that's so nice of you, Nami! You don't think you could take this loss for me, could you?
Oh, that's so sweet, Nami! Maybe I can show you my cards in the next... actually, I don't think the dealer would want their cards getting wet...
Hey, I know ~friend~! Just because you've got a bunch of people in your ear all the time doesn't mean the rest of us are all alone.
Well, I revealed my secret, and then I lost, so it seems like it had been working pretty well to me.

condition.saying: I'm sorry I'm not as in shape as you are,

case.state: What? Bernie, I would never do that to you. I'm not a monster!

condition.saying: Oh, a fellow student. What academy do you go to?

case.state: Oh, I'm from Garreg Mach Monastery's Officer Academy. They're all about leading troops into combat there, but I've made some great friends. Is your school anything like that?

condition.saying: Do you even know how to play,

case.state: Oh, only barely! You'll go easy on me, won't you?

condition.saying: what kinda spell did you use to get your hair

case.state: Spell? I don't mess around with magic, this is just my natural color!

condition.saying: Your hair’s so bright and pink! It looks sweet

case.state: Aww, thank you! Your hair's cute too, Akko! I'd love to help you style it up a bit some time!
It's okay... the other students are fun, but all the weapon drills and fighting really tires me out!
Who, me? With these noodle-arms? I'd rather be cheering someone else on from the sidelines!
Fighting's hard and makes you all sweaty! I mean sure, I'm pretty tough when I have Freikugel, but playing poker is so much nicer than a fight.
Just because it could be a fight doesn't mean that would make it better. This way nobody has to do any hard work, after all!
Well, if someone offered to pay I might consider it... sounds like a lot of work, though. I'd rather not get sweaty in the first place.

condition.saying: Looking at you more closely, you've got a pretty good body

case.state: Only so long as you don't mean sparring. I already get too much of that...

condition.saying: I wonder which fighting style you prefer
What type of gear do you prefer to use in a fight

case.state: That depends. I'd say my preferred fighting style is "cheering someone else on from the back lines" - but if you mean what weapon am I best with, then that's axes.

condition.saying: I am always searching for ways to become sharper

case.state: What? Spar with me? No, there's no need to do that, I wouldn't teach you anything you don't know already, really! I've got skinny little noodle-arms!
I'm here for the same reason we all are, to have fun. Just because I'm a noble doesn't mean I don't enjoy fun, you know.
Ugh, fine. So you got lucky. We still both know how this is going to end.
One good battle won't win you the war, Leonie. Any tactician would tell you that.
So you managed to get a win past me. Good job. That won't change that this ends with me on top.

condition.saying: you don't really need any social practice, do you?

case.state: Oh, I'm just here to have fun playing poker - and I guess if that helps you with your social interaction, then that's even better.
Seems like you really do know fashion. Good pick - Hilda Valentine Goneril, heir to House Goneril. Flattery is both welcomed and encouraged. Does my outfit tell you anything else?

Impressively spotted. Hilda Valentine Goneril, heir to House Goneril, at your service.
Considering you seem to have a good grip on fashion, what else does this outfit make you think?
This is the Garreg Mach Officer Academy uniform, yeah. It's surprisingly fashionable, considering how old the place is, but still not what I'd pick for myself...
I want to win, believe me, but taking out my hair ties and leaving my hair a mess? Nuh-uh. No way. Those are staying in. It's my socks that are coming off.
I know, right? That's what I get for signing up to the Officers Academy, I guess. I didn't expect learning to be a leader to involve so much actual training to fight, ugh...
You know, Senko, I think I like your idea of how to study a lot more than all the other ways I've heard. You and I are going to get along great.
A massage? If I didn't want to win this game, I would strip right here and now for that, believe me. That sounds amazing.
Pfft, what? No! That would be crazy! I just... had a really bad hand by chance, you know? I'm just a beginner, after all.
Whaaat? What kind of crazy strategy would rely on throwing a hand if you want to win? I'm just new to poker, that's all.
That's the thing, right - you don't expect a deer to be dangerous, so when it charges and gores you, you're not ready for it. Not like a dumb lion, being totally predictable.
Sure, everyone knows lions are dangerous, so they avoid them. But you don't expect to get attacked by a deer, and let your guard down - so that's when they get you! Survival of the smartest!
I know, right? It hurts to have to lose it for the game. Strip poker is so cruel to good outfits...
I know, right? We're playing strip poker - if you're not here to have fun and see hot people naked, like, what are you even doing? I'm so glad I've got you here, Polly!
Well, if you're offering, that would be great, Ignatz. Looks like I've got my boots to worry about now, though...
Well, personally, I consider my looks my greatest asset - but sure, I'm not bad with an axe if I have to fight. I prefer to stay on the sidelines and look pretty, though. That's my real skill.
